name: Wild (itch) (K.c.dignan, Lucia, Liam, Neryko)
description:
US:

  • K.C.Dignan - Story, Gameplay, Programming, Composer
  • Neryko - Art, Animation
  • Liam Swift - Systems & AI Programming
  • Lucia Mendoza - Sound Designer, Sound Mixer, Wwise Integration
  • Stereo Couture - Post Sound Production

With thanks to Ben Lever for vocals/lyrics on Adrenaline.

CONTROLS:

  • WASD to move. 
  • Space to jump/double jump (when learnt.)
  • J to Attack.
  • K to Dash (when learnt)
  • E to Interact .

While moving in the direction of a wall press space to wall jump (when learnt.)

There are 3 quests, 1 side quest, and 2 epic bosses to fight!
